import sys
n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
a.sort(reverse=True)
b = []

for i in range(n):
    b.append(a.pop(0))
    if a and a[0]*2 == b[-1]:
        b.append(a.pop(0))
print(' '.join(map(str, b)))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] % 3 == 0:
        a[i] //= 3
    else:
        a[i] *= 2
a.sort()
print(*a)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

a.sort(reverse=True)

b = []

for i in range(n):
    b.append(a.pop(0))
    if a and a[0]*2 == b[-1]:
        b.append(a.pop(0))

print(' '.join(map(str, b)))
